content: And we haven't faced a huge amount pressure or expectations that we would need to be talking of pricing levels a lot lower than they are now, although I think, everybody that we speak to had some expectation that there's going to be a recession or recessionary conditions next year, but they're all looking at their own unique positions, which in spite of expectation of an economic slowdown, they may be sitting with an order book that they feel gives them a lot of clarity that maybe not as much risk because maybe you would expect in the overall recessionary period.
